## Data Visualization Excercise

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
starwars
```

## Mass Vs Weight

We will study the Mass vs Weight relationship through scatterplot


```{r warning= FALSE}
library(ggplot2) 
ggplot(starwars, aes(x= height, y = mass)) + geom_point() +
  
  labs(title = "Mass vs Weight of Strwars Characters", x = "Heights (cm)", y = "Weight (kg)" )

```

## Anscombe's quartet
We summarize the quartet information by each set of data 
```{r message=FALSE}

library(Tmisc)
library(tidyverse)
head(quartet )
quartet %>%
  group_by(set) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_x = mean(x), 
    mean_y = mean(y),
    sd_x = sd(x),
    sd_y = sd(y),
    r = cor(x, y)
  )
```

We visualize all four set 
```{r quartet-plot,echo = FALSE, out.width = "80%", fig.asp = 0.5}

ggplot(quartet, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ set, ncol = 4)
```
